about_the_game:
About Shadow's Descent "Shadows' Descent" is an intense psychological horror game that immerses you in the oppressive atmosphere of a windowless hospital, where every corner can hide a deadly danger. You play as an investigator, trapped in this mysterious place, where every room holds puzzles to solve and terrifying secrets to uncover.

Exploration is key: every object, every sound, and every shadow can lead you deeper into this spiral of nightmares. As you progress, you discover scattered clues about the dark past of the hospital and its "patients", while being supernatural threats that seem to stalk you.

Key Features:

  • An Oppressive Atmosphere: Dive into a distressing universe where the absence of light and claustrophobia play a crucial role in the tension.
  • Exploration and Puzzles: Solve intriguing puzzles and discover secrets hidden in each room of this hospital.
  • Immersive Narrative: Uncover the macabre story through clues, diaries, and fragmented memories.
  • Immersive Sound: A captivating soundtrack and environmental sounds that reinforce the immersion and intensify the terror.

Will you be able to unravel the mysteries of the house or will you succumb to the shadows?

content_descriptors.notes: Depiction of murders in the game. Increased presence of blood in the game. No nudity is present.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system and processor required
